whatTypeOfPathwayIsThis: What type of pathway is this?
generalAPathwayWithNoBranchingSequencing: General - A pathway with no branching, sequencing of completion rules at the section level.
branchedTheAdminGivesTheLearnerTheChoice: Branched - The admin gives the learner the choice to complete one of up to three branches at the section level.
enforcedSequenceTheAdminRequiresTheLearn: Enforced sequence - The admin requires the learner to complete the sections in a linear path.
completionRulesTheAdminSpecifiesTheNumbe: Completion rules - The admin specifies the number of sections the learner must complete in order to receive credit for the pathway.
dragAnImageHereOrUploadFile: Drag an image here or upload file
provideAnEstimatedDurationForCompletingT: Provide an estimated duration for completing this pathway
allowsThisContentToBeSearchableInLearn: Allows this content to be searchable in Learn
permitsTheProEdgeRecommendationSystemToS: Permits the ProEdge recommendation system to share this with other users in your organization
allowsUsersToProvideRatingsAndReviewsOnT: Allows users to provide ratings and reviews on this content
progressionToolTip: Display a progression indicator at the top of the pathway page indiciating the number of items the user has completed out of the total needed to complete the pathway. Branched pathways do not have the option of displaying the progression indicator.
materialPublishedContent: The material published on this learning platform does not represent the views of PwC or its affiliates and PwC does not endorse or promote any products, services, statements of opinion or companies represented by or referenced in the content.
